SELECT tr.room_idx, ROOM_NAME, RF_NAME, RIMAGE_NAME, BED_NAME, BED_CNT, tr.HOTEL_CODE FROM td_room tr, td_room_bed trb, TD_ROOM_FACILITY trf, td_room_image tri, td_room_info trinfo
where tr.room_idx = trb.room_idx and tr.room_idx = tri.room_idx and tr.room_idx = trinfo.room_idx and tr.hotel_code = trb.hotel_code and tr.hotel_code = tri.hotel_code and tr.hotel_code = trinfo.hotel_code and tr.room_idx = #{room_idx}
